manifest_description.message: SEO Insights is a browser extension to get SEO relevant insights into the current website.

tools_gsc_mobile_friendly_description.message: Test how easily a visitor can use your page on a mobile device.

tools_gsc_rich_results_description.message: Test your publicly accessible page to see which rich results can be generated by the structured data it contains.

tools_gtmetrix_title.message: GTmetrix | Website Performance Testing and Monitoring

tools_gtmetrix_description.message: GTmetrix is a free tool to test and monitor your page's performance. Using Lighthouse, GTmetrix generates scores for your pages and offers actionable recommendations on how to optimize them.

tools_nu_html_checker_description.message: This tool can be used to refine and improve the HTML markup of a website.

tools_w3c_css_validation_description.message: The W3C CSS Validator is free software from the W3C that is designed to help web designers and web developers check their Cascading Style Sheets (CSS).

tools_pagespeed_insights_description.message: PageSpeed Insights analyzes the content of a web page, then generates suggestions to make that page faster.
